divs: Sighting DetailsMy backyard looks out over a corn field, but a few weeks ago we had some strong winds and some of the corn was knocked down. But a few here and there still stand. I saw what I thought was a plane. North about 12 miles above a hill line that is on Towerline Rd. going to Pekin after the river. I had my camera with me and my binoculars. Through my binoculars I could see a white sphere with green and blue lights, strobing. Coming closer I thought ok a plane but I'll watch it anyway which would be good so I can pick out planes over ufo's. I had come off the back steps and into the yard and I could still see it right above the corn and I was dodging random stalks to keep it in view and I lost it. I took my binoculars down and there it was a whole lot closer to my back yard and higher. It had covered seven miles in a split second. No sound I made sure of that. I looked at it and grabbed my camera , as I brought my camera up it disappeared. Gone. Clouds to the south , clear to the North. Now this is not the first time this has happened this summer. But each one seems to know I'm there and sort of performs for me.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around August 11th 2008
Summary: bright strobing thought it was a plane but covered about 7 miles and ascended in the blink of an eye
